H0.text: Nouakchott is the capital of which Islamic African republic. Mauritania's Neighbor

H1.text: Nouakchott is the capital of which Islamic African republic. Western Sahara

H2.text: Nouakchott is the capital of which Islamic African republic. Mali

H3.text: Nouakchott is the capital of which Islamic African republic. MAURETANIA

A4.text: France chose Nouakchott as the site of the new capital of Mauritania.

A5.text: Most of its population of some 4.3 million live in the temperate south of the country; roughly a third of the population is concentrated in the capital and largest city, Nouakchott, on the Atlantic coast.
